channel.title: Half Life Timeline
channel.description: Hey there, i founded some time ago a website where the timeline with many backgroundinformations were collected. Unfortunatelly i didnt bookmarked the page. Does anybody know the site? thanks for your answers

item.title: Half Life Timeline
item.dc:creator: Ramirezoid
item.description:
bob:

Seriously, guys, just read Half Life 2: Raising The Bar. There’s your Half Life Timeline for you. Wait for further details in Episode Three. E-mail Gabe Newell.

This is probably the best way to go mainly because it’s solid ‘fact’ with out fan-speculated crap.

Read full topic

item.title: Half Life Timeline
item.dc:creator: popsUlfr
item.description:
Don’t be. These things happen to everyone… ehh except Summer Glau of course.
(uhh… that was a close one)

Read full topic

item.title: Half Life Timeline
item.dc:creator: Lethal_Dark
item.description:
how do you do that?
how do you put it on first result on google??
I am really ashamed cause when i googled i must have overseen it…
but well perhaps i googled the wrong word (german)
but yea thanks thats the page.
I never had been suspected to find it with only 3 words…
sometimes you dont see the forest through the trees …

guys thank you i go in the next corner for beeing ashamed of myself

Read full topic

item.title: Half Life Timeline
item.dc:creator: popsUlfr
item.description:
Lamsey:

That’s the first result on Google, popsUflr. I’ll be extremely disappoint if that’s the one he was looking for

Oh! You’re right :facepalm:

This is going to be interesting if there’s really another Timeline out there (crosses fingers)

item.title: Half Life Timeline
item.dc:creator: popsUlfr
item.description:
I’m pretty sure you mean this page.

Chrillen:

It’s not all true though, the author guesses alot.

Well, he clearly states that it’s his own interpretation of the events. It’s a good starting point though, you just have to be cautious as to what you can consider a fact and what you can consider interpretation.

Read full topic

item.title: Half Life Timeline

item.description:
yea maybe but it was a page where the author always said what is confirmed and what suspicion

item.title: Half Life Timeline
item.dc:creator: Hazzmat
item.description:
[quote=“Lethal_Dark”]
i am sorry i dont get what you mean.
QUOTE]

He meant that the guy who made that story line used a lot of information that he made up without backing it up.

item.title: Half Life Timeline
item.dc:creator: Lethal_Dark
item.description:
i am sorry i dont get what you mean.
anyway if no one know lets just wait for someone that does know it.
its just a specific site where many details of the story and the background information is collected.
i hoped someone knows it here around cause i was searching it on goolge for hours.

Read full topic

item.description:
Lethal_Dark:

wow thanks :freeman:
that was just what i was looking for…
no seriously:
i googled hours.
but i mean a very specific detailed page.
many background informations about the combines and so on.

It’s not all true though, the author guesses alot.
